Shipping & Returns.

We ship on the same day or within one day of your placing order. to mainland UK, France, Germany, Republic Of Ireland, Belgium and Sweden and other European destinations.

If for any reason we do not have the stock to fulfil your order, you will be notified and offered an alternative or a full refund.  

  

Returns and Exchange:

We like you to be happy and fully satisfied with your purchase. Hence, we have no quibble returns and or exchange policy.

We will refund / exchange any item purchased when retuned to us in its original condition with all the tags attached within 30 days from receipt. Kindly advice if you like to get refund or exchange. We will process returned item with 1-3 days of receipt. For Exchange advice the size/ colour you need and we will send the replacement (subject to availability of stock), free of postage cost to you. For refund we will refund you cost of the item, to the same account you paid to us.

We take great care to send you correct item. In the unlikely event if you receive incorrect or damaged item we will reimburse you the return postage and replace the item or refund you as you like.

For secure and tracked return ( in U K) you can use this link: https://www.myhermes.co.uk/

Our Return address is Virtual Oasis Ltd. , 76 Abbotts Drive, Wembley, Middx. HA0 3SG

Goods retuned for exchange or refund is at your risk until received by us. We recommend you return them by recorded delivery or obtain a certificate of posting to claim loss in the unlikely event of loss in transit.
